meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Keith Herrell Mary Zeiss Stange Mark McDermott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #985.

td.p: Keith Herrell, a copy editor from Cincinnati, Ohio
Mary Zeiss Stange, a rancher & college professor from Ekalaka, Montana
Mark McDermott, an editorial writer originally from Iowa (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,402)

tr.td: SICKNESS & HEALTH
SPORTS
SINGERS
FLORIDA
FURNITURE
FOOD PHRASES
